summary: A once-powerful yakuza clan disbands as a result of a police crackdown but one small group refuses to bow to police pressure, and launches a campaign to take over Tokyo's drug, prostitution, and gambling rackets.
cast: Akira Kobayashi|Ryôji Hayama|Tadao Nakamaru|Hiroshi Nawa|Tatsuya Fuji|Yuriko Hime|Jirô Okazaki|Yoshi Katô|Fujio Suga|Bontarô Miake|Shinji Takano|Kichijirô Ueda|Takamaru Sasaki|Michio Hino|Kyôko Mine|Hiroshi Ichimura|Bumon Kahara|Hiroshi Chô|Tomio Aoki|Kenji Shimamura|Yoshihiko Tabata|Seishirô Iwate|Tessen Nakahira|Junichi Yamanobe|Akira Takahashi|Iwae Arai|Ken'ichi Shikita|Takehiko Maeda|Mamoru Tsuyuki|Masami Maki|Tadayuki Kitakami
title: Kôiki bôryoku: Ryuuketsu no shima
